/>
XII.ii.2.C.2.e
.
Action Taken by VA if Entitlement Certified by SSA Is Not Payable
If VA determines that entitlement certified by SSA on
SSA Forms 101
,
101C
, or
101U3
is
not
payable for any reason, notify the SSA PSC that made the certification.
title: M21-1, Part XII, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section C - Development of Claims for the Special Allowance Under 38 U.S.C. 1312(a)
citation: Part XII, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section C
